body:
Comment 5: 
I got the basics for gdb working yesterday; I have been working on lldb, just to make
sure that whatever I build works ok for both. If you can hang tight for a bit, I'll get
the gdb stuff into a state where you can start reasonably using it. It should make
maintaining and writing new tests a bit easier than manually syncing gdbtest.go and
gdbtest.gdb. (Sneak preview, soon to change to enable lldb support:
https://github.com/josharian/debugo/blob/spike/testdata/simple.go)
